## SimpleNoDataRendererComponent class

Component for basic simple no data renderer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SimpleNoDataRendererComponent implements SimpleNoDataRenderer, GridPluginGeneric<SimpleNoDataRendererOptions<CssClassesSimpleNoDataRenderer>>, OnDestroy 
```
